name: part_001
file: tmp_異次元フェス開催記念音楽番組　MUSIC BIGBANG！ [wUQ61OVMU2A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: MC section with characters from THE IDOLM@STER and hololive introducing the program.
Transition sequence introducing the first performance team.
Performance of 'Aien Jihen' covered by Fuyuko Mayuzumi.
Transition sequence for the next performance.
Performance of 'SOS' covered by La+ Darknesss.

subtitles.original: それじゃ名前も決まったところで、
subtitles.english: Well then, now that the name has been decided,

subtitles.original: 番組を始めていくわよ。
subtitles.english: let's start the program.

subtitles.original: 全国のリトルデーモンたち！
subtitles.english: Little Demons across the country!

subtitles.original: 私たちの音楽に酔いしれなさい！
subtitles.english: Indulge yourselves in our music!

subtitles.original: THE IDOLM@STER
subtitles.english: THE IDOLM@STER

subtitles.original: hololive
subtitles.english: hololive

subtitles.original: 先攻 チーム ふゆラブ
subtitles.english: First Turn: Team Fuyu Rabu

subtitles.original: 注目せよ！
subtitles.english: Pay attention!

subtitles.original: Can you feel "Madness" この世界の全て
subtitles.english: Can you feel "Madness"? Everything in this world...

subtitles.original: 合縁事変 歌：黛 冬優子
subtitles.english: Aien Jihen, Sung by: Fuyuko Mayuzumi

subtitles.original: 冬優子がラプラスの曲を異次元カバー
subtitles.english: Fuyuko covering La+'s song across dimensions

subtitles.original: Can you feel "Galaxy" 果てを飛び超えた Glory
subtitles.english: Can you feel "Galaxy"? Glory that soared past the horizon.

subtitles.original: バイアスかかるバイブスで 深淵より宿すパワーを tune up
subtitles.english: With biased vibes, tune up the power dwelling from the abyss.

subtitles.original: Massで成り立つCapitalに 一罰百戒 穿つ「理想像」
subtitles.english: In a Capital built on the masses, pierce an "ideal" as a warning to all.

subtitles.original: 傷天害理 汝、二乗で満たす存在意義
subtitles.english: Inhumanity, thou shall fulfill your raison d'être by squaring it.

subtitles.original: In the Flow 直な「ない」返し「はい」 獅子博兎 +Impact!
subtitles.english: In the flow, a blunt "no" returned with "yes." Full strength on a trivial task + Impact!

subtitles.original: まわりまわる多様性を 感情的なルールで縛り付け
subtitles.english: Binding the spinning diversity with emotional rules,

subtitles.original: 「うるせぇ全く！」
subtitles.english: "Shut up, seriously!"

subtitles.original: うねりうねる可能性で
subtitles.english: With twisting and turning possibilities,

subtitles.original: 全て超えた Identity
subtitles.english: Identity that has surpassed everything.

subtitles.original: Can you feel my soul
subtitles.english: Can you feel my soul

subtitles.original: Baby, up & up now 3, 2, 1
subtitles.english: Baby, up & up now 3, 2, 1

subtitles.original: Nothing bad happened.
subtitles.english: Nothing bad happened.

subtitles.original: 案じたってまわる循環定義
subtitles.english: Even if you worry, it's just a spinning circular definition.

subtitles.original: 変わらぬ真理 合縁奇縁の淀み点
subtitles.english: Unchanging truth, the stagnation point of strange twists of fate.

subtitles.original: make it Nothing bad happened.
subtitles.english: make it Nothing bad happened.

subtitles.original: 君は君 いらぬ疑心暗鬼
subtitles.english: You are you, no need for groundless suspicion.

subtitles.original: 不毛なBlowと焦らすFlow
subtitles.english: Fruitless Blow and impatient Flow,

subtitles.original: 募る鼓動でHigh up & up
subtitles.english: getting high up & up with gathering heartbeats.

subtitles.original: 我が道をゆくMinority あざとくIrony
subtitles.english: A minority walking their own path, cunning irony.

subtitles.original: ちらり見せるピュアなハート 悩殺御免
subtitles.english: Glimpsing a pure heart, sorry for being so captivating.

subtitles.original: 夢描いていた名声赫赫 人類学 核にtuning up
subtitles.english: The illustrious fame dreamed of, tuning up at the core of anthropology.

subtitles.original: すべて解き明かす 心満たす様
subtitles.english: Unraveling everything, satisfying the heart.

subtitles.original: その美的な知識を刺激して
subtitles.english: Stimulating that aesthetic knowledge,

subtitles.original: 私的に生きてる体も shaking up and shape up
subtitles.english: even the body living privately is shaking up and shaping up.

subtitles.original: 我が道をゆく共犯者
subtitles.english: An accomplice walking their own path.

subtitles.original: Are you ready to fall into deep.
subtitles.english: Are you ready to fall into deep.

subtitles.original: かすむ視界は冥冥 ひびく名声
subtitles.english: The hazy vision is pitch dark, echoing fame.

subtitles.original: 叫べ「メーデー」
subtitles.english: Cry out "Mayday!"

subtitles.original: 無垢な犠牲 足りない愛を狂わす
subtitles.english: Innocent sacrifice, driving insufficient love mad.

subtitles.original: まわりまわる多様性を 感情的なルールで縛り付け
subtitles.english: Binding the spinning diversity with emotional rules,

subtitles.original: 「うるせぇ全く！」
subtitles.english: "Shut up, seriously!"

subtitles.original: うねりうねる可能性で
subtitles.english: With twisting and turning possibilities,

subtitles.original: 全て超えた Identity
subtitles.english: Identity that has surpassed everything.

subtitles.original: Can you feel my soul
subtitles.english: Can you feel my soul

subtitles.original: Baby, up & up now 3, 2, 1
subtitles.english: Baby, up & up now 3, 2, 1

subtitles.original: Nothing bad happened.
subtitles.english: Nothing bad happened.

subtitles.original: 案じたってまわる循環定義
subtitles.english: Even if you worry, it's just a spinning circular definition.

subtitles.original: 変わらぬ真理 合縁奇縁の淀み点
subtitles.english: Unchanging truth, the stagnation point of strange twists of fate.

subtitles.original: make it Nothing bad happened.
subtitles.english: make it Nothing bad happened.

subtitles.original: 君は君 いらぬ疑心暗鬼
subtitles.english: You are you, no need for groundless suspicion.

subtitles.original: 不毛なBlowと焦らすFlow
subtitles.english: Fruitless Blow and impatient Flow,

subtitles.original: 募る鼓動でHigh up & up
subtitles.english: getting high up & up with gathering heartbeats.

subtitles.original: 異次元フェス開催記念 MUSIC BIGBANG!
subtitles.english: Ijigen Fes Commemoration Music Program MUSIC BIGBANG!

subtitles.original: キミにFall in love 恋のSOS ずっと胸が苦しいんです
subtitles.english: Fall in love with you, SOS of love. My chest has been aching for so long.

subtitles.original: ハヤケRescue 「好き」のテレパシーに早く気づいて！
subtitles.english: Rescue me quickly! Notice my telepathy of "love" soon!

subtitles.original: SOS 歌：ラプラス・ダークネス
subtitles.english: SOS, Sung by: La+ Darknesss

subtitles.original: ラプラスが冬優子の曲を異次元カバー
subtitles.english: La+ covering Fuyuko's song across dimensions

subtitles.original: 初めて出逢ったときから ハートが震えてたんだよ
subtitles.english: My heart has been trembling ever since we first met.

subtitles.original: 無意識に意識しちゃう この感じはきっと（重症です）
subtitles.english: I find myself conscious of you without thinking. This feeling must be... (serious).

subtitles.original: 目と目が合うだけで顔が熱いの
subtitles.english: My face gets hot just by our eyes meeting.

subtitles.original: 話しかけられて頭がパニック
subtitles.english: My head panics when you talk to me.

subtitles.original: ドキドキし過ぎて会話続かない
subtitles.english: My heart is pounding too hard to continue the conversation.
